data.Title: Google Core Update Coming Soon
data.Description: Google's John Mueller has confirmed that the next core update is not far away, although he did not provide a specific timeline. This announcement comes amidst ongoing volatility in Google's search rankings, suggesting potential testing for the update.

data.Title: Google Search Ranking Volatility Remains High
data.Description: Google's search rankings have been experiencing high volatility over the past two weeks, leading to speculation about the upcoming core update and potential algorithm adjustments.

data.Title: Google Discover Promotes AI Overviews
data.Description: Google Discover is actively promoting AI Overviews by integrating buttons that direct users to the Search page to view them.

data.Title: Google Business Profiles Adds AI-Powered Menu Generation
data.Description: Google Business Profiles now allows businesses to generate menus directly from uploaded photos using AI, simplifying menu management.

data.Title: Reddit Blocks Bing and Other Search Engines From Accessing Content
data.Description: Reddit is blocking AI bots from major search engines, including Bing, unless they agree to pay for access to its data. This move has implications for search results and content visibility.

data.Title: Microsoft Bing Integrates AI into Search Results
data.Description: Microsoft is rolling out a generative AI-powered search experience for Bing, aiming to provide more dynamic and comprehensive search results with prominent links to external sites.

data.Title: Connatix and JW Player in Merger Talks
data.Description: Video ad tech companies Connatix and JW Player are reportedly in merger talks, with PE firm Court Square expected to help fund the deal as consolidation in the sector continues.

data.Title: Google Delays Third-Party Cookie Deprecation
data.Description: Google has again delayed the deprecation of third-party cookies, leaving marketers and publishers grappling with the evolving privacy landscape and the future of digital advertising.
